item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello! Having finally gotten this site up and running, I thought it would be time to do an introductory post about who I am and what I’ll be publishing here. Information security is a lifestyle for me as well as a profession. Outside of work, I’m usually doing CTFs, researching new methodologies and attack types, and working on a certification or course of some kind. I want this to be a place where I share things I’ve learned in different forms.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a penetration tester and security researcher. I do CTF challenges in my free time. Contact Twitter Github HackTheBox Certifications CEH GWAPT CISA Training Offensive Security - Pentesting With Kali v2 SANS SEC642 - Advanced Web App Penetration Testing SANS SEC442 - Web App Penetration Testing EC-Council - Malware & Memory Forensics EC-Council - Mobile Forensics
